name: Hop Robotics
description: Hop Robotics produces automation systems to streamline draft beverage dispensing for events and venues.  Our technology enables automatic fulfillment after payment allowing operators to capture up to 40% more revenue to maximize existing labor.  We leverage the reliability of industrial-grade robotics to support the hospitality sector in reducing waste and increasing speed of service without sacrificing the human touch.
